events.message: Customer submitted a claim reporting a car accident involving their vehicle on the highway during rush hour.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident based on the description of the vehicle collision.
A claims agent specialized in auto accidents was assigned to handle this case promptly to ensure quick processing.
Customer was notified that we acknowledge the claim and the investigation will start shortly to resolve efficiently.
Requested police report, vehicle damage photos, and driver's license copy from the claimant to proceed with evaluation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including official police report and multiple photos of vehicle damages.
Claims investigator began examining submitted evidence and verifying accident details with local authorities.
Investigation concluded confirming the other party was at fault and damages reported are consistent with collision.
A settlement amount was proposed to the customer covering all repair costs and towing fees as assessed.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement, expressing satisfaction with the prompt service.
Claim was officially approved following confirmation of customer’s acceptance of the settlement terms.
Payment for vehicle repair was issued to the customer through bank transfer as per the approved settlement.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation that the repair work was completed to customer’s satisfaction.
All documentation and case notes for the auto accident claim were archived securely in the company database.
